sentences.english: I want to compute the length of the hypotenuse of a right triangle.
sentences.chinese: 我想计算下，直角三角形的斜边。

sentences.english: A right triangle is formed by lines joining points SPQ.
sentences.chinese: SPQ三点联结后即构成一个直角三角形。

sentences.english: In fact, it is a right-angled triangle .
sentences.chinese: 事实上，那是一个直角三角形。

sentences.english: You have nicer legs than an Isosceles right triangle.
sentences.chinese: 你的腿比等腰直角三角形漂亮多了。

sentences.english: finding right triangles with a certain circumference.
sentences.chinese: 给定周长寻找直角三角形。
你就得到一个直角三角形。

definition: axis of symmetry/central axis (in Chinese architecture)
